Prerequisite(s): Three Shattered Mirror maneuvers
Range: Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./ level)
Target: You and adjacent opponents (see text)
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

You step through reflected light, vanishing into the splash of light of of a blade and emerging from a mirror, a prism, or even the reflection in an enemy's eye. When you initiate this boost, you can teleport to any unoccupied space within long range (400 feet + 40 feet per initiator level). Opponents adjacent to the square you leave and the square you arrive in become cursed and flat-footed for one round.
